review: Exceeded my expectations!!!  Easy to install and ready in minutes to enjoy my Netflix.....  I will buy on for every TV in the house.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Extremely easy install, beautiful menu screen, looks great. Great value.
author: Miguel Arias

review: Received as a gift and love it
author: Amazon Customer

review: Works great, easy to install, although the Fire Stick will not plug directly into the HDMI port, its a good thing it comes with the extender cable.
author: J. Flynn

review: I really love this, as opposed to trying to use my Wii or blue-ray.  I've only had buffering issues once, but it might be internet.  I do wish there were a few more apps like HBO, Starz or CW for channels, but I did get my Showtime, which is nice.  I hope they just keep adding to this.  The remote is really really awesome.
author: G Herman

review: Given as gift for Christmas and receiver was overwhelmed.  Loved it.
author: Janet Dunn "coffee freak"

review: Love the fire stick!!!!  So much at our fingertips, thank you
author: DeezerD

review: It lives up to the hype and positive reviews. No regrets on the purchase and worth the very reasonable cost.
author: Kindle Customer
